alert.note: Alert for Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 23 at 10:43PM EST until December 24 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST SATURDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the beaches, Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Kitty Hawk Bay, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will continue to experience minor flooding. Minor inundation on roads in Downtown Manteo, Colington Harbor and other low lying soundside roads and properties will persist overnight. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Oregon Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 24/08 AM 3.3 2.7 2.6 2-3 Minor 24/08 PM 2.5 1.9 2.1 2 None 25/09 AM 2.4 1.8 1.7 2 None 25/09 PM 1.9 1.3 1.5 2 None 26/10 AM 2.0 1.4 1.3 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
